data.eml:eml: Review of the arrowtooth eel genera Dysomma and Dysommina in Taiwan, with the description of a new species (Anguilliformes: Synaphobranchidae: Ilyophinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching, Smith, David G., Tighe, Kenneth A. (2015): Review of the arrowtooth eel genera Dysomma and Dysommina in Taiwan, with the description of a new species (Anguilliformes: Synaphobranchidae: Ilyophinae). Zootaxa 4060 (1): 86-104, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4060.1.12
